snippet.title: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers
snippet.description:
If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure exploring the stories of four different guests in a masked ball taking place on a train in the late 1920s.

Out March 10th for free on https://laurahunt.itch.io/if-on-a-winters-night-four-travelers.

Coming to Steam in September 2021! Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1603980/

Visit https://twitter.com/deadidlegames for updates!
